#summary Documentation of MVC's Control.
{{{
interface: Suskind_Control_Interface
basic class: Suskind Control
}}}
= Introduction =
In the layout, developers describe which control's which view want to use. So, the controller handling this via {{{__call()}}} function, and transforms the pseudo method to the name of the wished class.
Example:
  in {{{$guestbook->list();}}}
  - controller class is: Application_{{{Guestbook_Control}}}
  - view class is: {{{Application_Guestbook_View_List}}}
